I am starting this part, not because of lack of discussion of the 
othe parts, but because discussing this is just around the corner.

Wish List Part 4 is about features for Gladiator:Beyond Freedom.

I'll start by saying very good AI for opponents. 2nd feature, ability 
to set up formation for your characters.  I would like to keep my 
archers in the back; soldiers, orcs, and orc captains in the front; 
mages scouting territory; clerics toward the middle; etc.
